Element.name: LayoutComponent
Element.Description: A layout component is the representation of a component in the layout.

PropertyCategory.name: Layout
PropertyCategory.Property: If checked, the layout attribute of the component are automatically managed. If the shown attributes must be different from the displayed attribute uncheck the property and open the <a href="/Reference/WizardsAndDialogs/ShownAttributesDialog"/> clicking on the Edit button . Choose the attributes to display.

If checked, the layout fields of the component are automatically managed. If not all fields are to be rendered, uncheck the property and open the <a href="/Reference/WizardsAndDialogs/ShownFieldsDialog"/> clicking on the Edit button . Choose the fields to display.

If checked, the layout flow of the component are automatically managed. If not all flows are to be rendered, uncheck the property and open the Shown Flows Selection Dialog clicking on the Edit button . Choose the flows to display.
